      <description>![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[div class="chapo has-text-weight-semibold mb-5">
div>Quelques semaines après sa présentation, la nouvelle Tesla Model 3 standard est disponible à la commande en France. La voiture électrique abordable démarre à seulement 36 990 euros dans cette version. C'est la moins chère des Tesla de l'histoire./div>

    <item>
      <title>Google lance Gemini 3 Deep Think, un modèle si fort qu’il coûte 275 euros par mois</title>
      <description>![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[
Annoncé parallèlement à Gemini 3 Pro, mais pas totalement prêt fin novembre, le modèle Gemini 3 Deep Think est disponible depuis le 4 décembre. Il s'agit d'une version ultra-puissante du modèle de Google qui étudie plusieurs chaînes de raisonnement simultanément pour résoudre des problèmes complexes.

    <item>
      <title>Tesla lance une nouvelle Model 3 hyper abordable en France, à moins de 37 000 €</title>
      <description>![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[
Tesla termine l'année 2025 en gonflant son catalogue avec un nouveau modèle qui risque de rencontrer un franc succès  une Model 3 dite Standard, proposée sous la barre des 37 000 € et avec une autonomie largement confortable (plus de 500 km).

      <description>![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[The Email Verification, Email OTP, Block Spam Email, Passwordless login, Hide Login, Magic Login – User Verification plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to authentication bypass in all versions up to, and including, 2.0.39. This is due to the plugin not properly validating that an OTP was generated before comparing it to user input in the "user_verification_form_wrap_process_otpLogin" function.       <description>![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[The CRM Memberships plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to privilege escalation via password reset in all versions up to, and including, 2.5. This is due to missing authorization and authentication checks on the `ntzcrm_changepassword` AJAX action. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to reset arbitrary user passwords and gain unauthorized access to user accounts via the `ntzcrm_changepassword` endpoint, granted they can obtain or enumerate a target user's email address. The plugin also exposes the `ntzcrm_get_users` endpoint without authentication, allowing attackers to enumerate subscriber email addresses, facilitating the exploitation of the password reset vulnerability. | CVSS Score 9.8 (CRITICAL)  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  </description>

This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the Xcloner_Remote_Storagesave() function.     <item>
      <title>CVE-2025-66559 Taiko Alethia is an Ethereum-equivalent, permissionless, based rollup designed to scale Ethereum wit...</title>
      <description>![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[Taiko Alethia is an Ethereum-equivalent, permissionless, based rollup designed to scale Ethereum without compromising its fundamental properties. In 2.3.1 and earlier, TaikoInbox._verifyBatches (packages/protocol/contracts/layer1/based/TaikoInbox.sol627-678) advanced the local tid to whatever transition matched the current blockHash before knowing whether that batch would actually be verified. When the loop later broke (e.g., cooldown window not yet passed or transition invalidated), the function still wrote that newer tid into batches[lastVerifiedBatchId].verifiedTransitionId after decrementing batchId. Result the last verified batch could end up pointing at a transition index from the next batch (often zeroed), corrupting the verified chain pointer. | Severity UNKNOWN  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  </description>

    <item>
      <title>CVE-2025-66564 Sigstore Timestamp Authority is a service for issuing RFC 3161 timestamps. Prior to 2.0.3, Function ...</title>
      <description>![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[![CDATA[Sigstore Timestamp Authority is a service for issuing RFC 3161 timestamps. Prior to 2.0.3, Function api.ParseJSONRequest currently splits (via a call to strings.Split) an optionally-provided OID (which is untrusted data) on periods. Similarly, function api.getContentType splits the Content-Type header (which is also untrusted data) on an application string. As a result, in the face of a malicious request with either an excessively long OID in the payload containing many period characters or a malformed Content-Type header, a call to api.ParseJSONRequest or api.getContentType incurs allocations of O(n) bytes (where n stands for the length of the function's argument). This vulnerability is fixed in 2.0.3. | CVSS Score 7.5 (HIGH)  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  ]]>  </description>
